entry.title: Adding New BIP Editors
entry.summary: In a recent discussion, the emphasis was on broadening the group responsible for handling Bitcoin Improvement Proposals (BIPs), suggesting an increase in members to more than nine. This strategy aims to ensure that personal biases are minimized and decisions reflect a majority consensus. The individuals named in the endorsement—Kanzure, RubenSomsen, Seccour, Jon Atack, and Roasbeef—are recognized for their potential contributions to this task. The underlying motive is to return BIPs to their original purpose: serving as a platform for gathering ideas rather than enforcing them. This approach underlines the importance of collective decision-making in the development and implementation of BIPs, ensuring that the process remains inclusive and representative of the wider community's views.
